name: Mustang Harry's
description: Massive multi-level Irish sports bar near Madison Square Garden with 85+ screens and award-winning wings, one of the busiest game-day venues in Midtown.

name: Stout NYC
description: Three-story, 16,000 sq ft Irish sports pub that is the Official Bar of the New York Rangers, located a block from MSG with 36 HD TVs.

name: Football Factory at Legends
description: Multi-floor bar directly across from the Empire State Building, home to NYC's premier soccer bar showing 100+ matches per week including every MLS game.

name: Smithfield Hall NYC
description: Upscale Chelsea sports pub with 26 TVs and 9 heated outdoor tables, self-described as the home of football in New York City with a soccer-first focus.

name: The Grafton
description: Family-run East Village Irish pub that becomes the neighborhood's hottest sports destination during Knicks and Yankees playoff runs, with a beloved backyard viewing area.

name: Standings
description: Beloved East Village sports den rated by Sports Illustrated as Class of the East Coast, with 8 flatscreens, all major sports packages, and free pizza on Fridays.

name: Blondie's Sports
description: Veteran Upper West Side sports bar open since 1990, home to numerous college alumni clubs and a top destination for football and basketball on the Upper West Side.

name: East End Bar & Grill
description: Self-proclaimed #1 sports bar on the Upper East Side with 16 HDTVs and an 80-inch projection screen; official Giants bar where wins earn free Fireball shots.

name: Harlem Tavern
description: Spacious beer garden bar-restaurant at 116th St with 16 TVs and outdoor seating, a top pick for Yankees and Knicks watch parties in upper Manhattan.

name: Stan's Sports Bar
description: Legendary dive bar directly across from Yankee Stadium operating since the 1970s, open on Yankees home game days with wall-to-wall memorabilia and die-hard Bronx fans.

name: Yankee Tavern
description: Classic Bronx tavern established in 1964, filled floor-to-ceiling with Yankees memorabilia and fueling fans with beer and pub grub for six decades near Yankee Stadium.

name: Billy's Sports Bar
description: Modern spacious sports bar near Yankee Stadium with a sleek interior, rooftop bar, and official NYCFC watch party atmosphere.

name: Roebling Sporting Club
description: Williamsburg's go-to sports bar with 11 HD screens, all major sports packages, renowned for genuinely spicy wings and an extensive craft beer selection.

name: Banter
description: One of Brooklyn's most respected soccer pubs with deep ties to the local supporters community, showing Premier League, Champions League, and MLS on 6 screens.

name: Keg & Lantern Brewing Company
description: Craft brewery and sports bar hybrid in Greenpoint with in-house brewed ales, an outdoor backyard with TVs, and a warm pub setting.

name: Break Bar & Billiards
description: 7,000 sq ft Queens entertainment bar with 25+ HD TVs, pool tables, ping-pong, foosball, and darts; the top sports bar destination in Astoria.

name: Bronx Alehouse
description: Lively Kingsbridge craft beer bar with 40+ rotating taps and numerous TVs, drawing passionate local crowds for Giants, Yankees, and Knicks games.

name: Overlook
description: Midtown East sports bar with 26 HDTVs and an open-air rooftop deck, recognized as the best Islanders bar in Manhattan.
